events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your qualifications and experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be in touch soon to guide you through the process.
We completed the initial screening of your application and your skill set aligns well with the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for responding quickly and providing your availability for the upcoming interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC with our lead developer.
The technical interview is complete; you demonstrated strong coding and problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 14th at 11 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview successfully, and we are impressed with your professionalism and fit.
We have prepared an offer for you with competitive salary and benefits and sent it via email.
You responded positively to the offer and requested additional details regarding the stock options.
You have accepted our offer, and we are excited to have you join the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with access to all necessary resources and an introductory session scheduled.
Your hiring case is now officially closed; welcome to the company and good luck in your new role.
